DOC.brief_title: A Placebo-Controlled , Randomized , Safety Efficacy Study Evaluate Change Hemoglobin A1c Levels Type 2 Diabetic Subjects While Taking Nutralin
DOC.detailed_description: The investigational product help decrease amount insulin need treat diabetic dog improve dog ' longevity quality life . Observational analysis train veterinarian indicated natural fluctuation blood glucose level exist dog consume product . An initial Phase 1 study test product brownie form . The product reformulate capsule form Phase 2 study . The hypothesis study diabetic individual decrease insulin/diabetic medication usage decrease glucose level consume product 16 week .
DOC.criteria: Men woman least 18 year old Diagnosis Type 2 Diabetes Has stable diabetes medication/insulin past three month Women pregnant , breastfeed plan become pregnant Diagnosis Celiac Disease gluten intolerance Current active kidney disease Current active liver disease Any food allergy
